name: GradeWiz
headline: AI Teaching Assistant that grades student work and gives feedback.
description: GradeWiz is an AI teaching assistant that helps educators create rubrics, grade student work and give feedback. Like a human TA, professors teach it to grade just like them. Used at 12 Colleges, reducing grading time by 60% on average.

founders.name: Max Bohun, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder @ GradeWiz - AI Teaching Assistant that grades student work and gives feedback. 
NLP Undergraduate Researcher, Course Assistant @ Cornell.

founders.name: Aman Garg, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of GradeWiz - AI Teaching Assistant that grades student work.

CS at Cornell.

# AI Teaching Assistant for **G**
Educators should spend their time doing what they love: teaching their students. Not getting buried under endless stacks of paper to grade. At the same time, students deserve detailed feedback that doesn't take weeks. Join us on our mission to modernize education.
[Talk to Founders](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/calendly.com/maxbohun/gradewiz>) [Contact Us](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#contact>)
![GradeWiz iPad](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/gw-hero-ipad.png)
![OXY](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/oxi-college.svg)![Cornell University](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university.svg)![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ithaca-college.svg)![Humbold](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/calpoly-humboldt.svg)![Hunter](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/hunter.svg)![Drew university](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/drew-university.svg) ![OXY](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/oxi-college.svg)![Cornell University](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university.svg)![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ithaca-college.svg)![Humbold](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/calpoly-humboldt.svg)![Hunter](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/hunter.svg)![Drew university](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/drew-university.svg)![OXY](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/oxi-college.svg)![Cornell University](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university.svg)![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ithaca-college.svg)![Humbold](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/calpoly-humboldt.svg)![Hunter](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/hunter.svg)![Drew university](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/drew-university.svg)
![OXY](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/oxi-college.svg)![Cornell University](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university.svg)![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ithaca-college.svg)![Humbold](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/calpoly-humboldt.svg)![Hunter](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/hunter.svg)![Drew university](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/drew-university.svg)
60%
Faster Grading
13,000+
Submissions Graded
95%
Symphony Model Accuracy
100%
Improve student learning
For Educators
## GradeWiz is Coming to Your Institution!
We're bringing the magic of AI-powered grading to education. Help your students learn and grow with instant, encouraging feedback that speaks their language. 
[ Join Waitlist ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For Homework
## Grade in just a few clicks
![Math](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-math.svg)
### Students Upload Work
When a student submits their exam or assignment, GradeWiz applies computer vision techniques to segment the work into individual questions.
![step arrow](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/step-s.svg)
![scan](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-scan.svg)
### AI-Powered Grading, Feedback
GradeWiz uses our Symphony Model to complete the grading rubric and generate detailed, individualized feedback. We focus on explaining where the student went wrong, while emphasizing what they did well.
![step arrow](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/step-s.svg)
![review](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-review.svg)
### Instructor Review
After review by the instructor, feedback and grades can be released to students with a single click. GradeWiz also provides in-depth analysis on student performance such as common mistakes.
For Exams
## A week of grading done in minutes
![scheme 1](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/scheme-1.svg)![mobile scheme 1](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/mobile-scheme-1.png)
Features
## Powerful AI tools to supercharge your assessment
![rubric](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-rubric-g.svg)
### AI Rubric generation
Create detailed rubrics for your entire assignment with one click
![regrade](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-regrade.svg)
### AI Regrade
Tailor GradeWiz to grade exactly the way you do. Give it instructions, the same way you would instruct a TA.
![parsing](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-parsing.svg)
### AI Parsing
Reuse your old assignments by uploading them to GradeWiz, in seconds
![analytics](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-analitics.svg)
### AI Analytics
Get a big picture understanding of common student mistakes to help tailor your teaching.
Benefits
## We help your students learn by helping you teach
01
### Less time spent grading
Instead of going through and grading every single question by yourself, tell our model how to grade it instead. Then review the grades and instruct the model on any changes to grading.
02
### Detailed, actionable feedback
GradeWiz generates an entire paragraph of tailored feedback for each student, helping them learn from their mistakes with minimal frustration.
03
### Fair, consistent grading
GradeWiz is completely objective in its grading - it doesn't get tired from late night sessions and it doesn't rush to make it for dinner. Give your students access to the hardest working grader ever.
04
### Tailored teaching
Transform grading data into actionable insights. GradeWiz analyzes student responses to identify common misconceptions and knowledge gaps across your class to adapt your teaching strategy in real-time. 
What people think
## Feedback from Students and Educators
![Humbold](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/humbold-color.svg)
> GradeWiz offers a level of grading automation, rubric generation, and substantive feedback that I have not seen in other teaching tools, AI-based or otherwise. Every teacher wants to give their students detailed feedback on their work but is usually pressed for time to do so. GradeWiz enables you to spend more of your time focused on improving student learning outcomes, rather than manual grading. 
![advisor](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/advisor.png)
Keith Sollers,Cal Poly Humboldt
![OXY](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/oxy-colege-color.svg)
> I appreciate that GradeWiz gives students detailed feedback that I don't have time to give myself. 
Chemistry Professor, Occidental College
![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ithaca-college-color.svg)
> It has been a great value add for me. It's giving my students feedback where they wouldn't get it in the past, all while cutting my time by 70%. 
Physics Professor, Ithaca College
![Humbold](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university-color.svg)
> Getting my grades back same day has been amazing! The feedback was very specific and helpful. It told me exactly what I did wrong and helped me learn more effectively. 
Student, Cornell University
![Hunter](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/hunter-color.svg)
> GradeWiz takes so much load off my plate. Impressive technology. Max and Aman have been extremely responsive to my requests and suggestions. 
Chemistry Professor, Hunter College
![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university-color.svg)
> GradeWiz made grading an instant task for me. As a part-time professor, getting grades back to my students on time has always been challenging. GradeWiz solved this problem! 
Business Professor, Cornell University
![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/humbold-color.svg)
> It's amazing. You just tell the AI how you want work graded and it does exactly that. It's like having a blazing fast TA 24/7 
Calculus Professor, Cal Poly Humboldt
![ITHACA college](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ithaca-college-color.svg)
> I found the feedback at the end very beneficial. It was very detailed and it helped me figure out exactly where I was deficient. I also liked that it gave me details on where I went right too so I can keep doing that. 
Student, Ithaca College
![Cornell University](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/cornell-university-color.svg)
> I really loved the detailed feedback that includes what I can do better. It was tailored to my exact wording and phrasing and will absolutely help in the future with what to include and what to leave out. 
Student, Cornell University
Our grading engine, 95% grading accuracy.
## Symphony Model
![Scheme 2](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/scheme-2.svg)![mobile scheme 2](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/mobile-scheme-2.svg)
Built for Institutions, Designed for Impact
## Institution-ready
![VPAT](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/vpat.png)
### VPAT
We provide a VPAT report that details our adherence to accessibility standards. We are committed to inclusive education.
![W3C](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/w3c.png)
### WCAG 2.2 Compliant
GradeWiz fully meets WCAG 2.2 AA standards. We make sure our platform is accessible to everyone.
![HECVAT](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/hecvat.png)
### HECVAT (Secure)
Our HECVAT Full and Lite forms are available upon request. Security and reliability are central to what we do.
![FERPA](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ferpa.png)
### FERPA Compliant
GradeWiz fully complies with FERPA standards. We value students' privacy and data and protect it at all times.
Software Integrations 
## Seamlessly Integrated,Effortlessly Connected
![](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/connected.png)![](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/connected-m.png)
Reach out with any questions, usage inquiries or business proposals
## Contact Us
Title
First name
Last name
Email Address
Phone number
Message
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
Can't find what you're looking for? ‍[Chat with our founding team!](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/calendly.com/maxbohun/gradewiz>)
## Frequently asked questions
Getting Started Using GradeWiz Feedback and Grading Account and Privacy General
### [How do I create an account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
To create an account, visit the login page and follow the prompts to enter your information. You will receive a confirmation email to activate your account.
### [How do I log in? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Go to the login page and enter your email and password. If you forgot your password, use the "Forgot Password" link to reset it.
### [What information do I need to create an account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For a teacher account, you'll need your First Name, Last Name, School Name, email address, and an access code. If you're interested in a free trial and need an access code, email support@gradewiz.ai.
### [How do I confirm my email address after signing up? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You will receive a verification email with a link to confirm your email address. 
### [What should I do if I don't receive the confirmation email? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Check out [How Do I Sign Up?](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/drive.google.com/file/d/1Q2ahTxVlJQFLk75NR11IXOsaMBz_Jpu4/view>) documentation.
### [How do I change my account password? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click "Forgot Password" on the login page and enter your email to reset your password.
### [Can I create multiple accounts with the same email? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
No, each email address can only be associated with one account.
### [How do I update my profile information? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Currently, you cannot modify your account information after signing up, so please be careful when entering your details.
### [Is there a mobile app for GradeWiz? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
No, we do not have a mobile app at the moment. If you think there's a need, please reach out to support@gradewiz.ai with your suggestions.
### [What file formats are supported for assignment submissions? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Standard GradeWiz assignments only support PDF files for assignment submissions. Flex Assignments allow for textual input, images, and multiple-choice questions.
### [How do I create an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Navigate to the "Assignments" tab and click "Create New Assignment." Upload the assignment PDF you'd like to use as a starting point, and GradeWiz will automatically input all the fields for you.
### [How do teacher submissions work? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For teacher submissions, used for in-class assignments or exams, the teacher collects, scans, and submits the assignment. Automatic handwriting recognition detects the student's name and ID on the top of the page to assign the work to them.
### [How do student submissions work? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For student submissions (i.e., take-home assignments), students are responsible for scanning and submitting their assignments as PDFs on the assignment page.
### [Can I edit an assignment after it has been created? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can edit the assignment until it is published. Once published, the assignment cannot be edited. If you made a mistake, you would need to delete it and create a new one. This prevents discrepancies between the distributed assignment PDFs and the updated versions. 
### [How do I delete an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click the trash can icon on the assignment list to delete an assignment.
### [How do I view all submissions for an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
After clicking on the assignment, scroll down to review submissions either by student or by question. Reviewing by student allows you to see each student's entire submission, while reviewing by question lets you compare responses to the same question across different students.
### [Can students submit assignments late? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, late submissions are accepted until grades are published.
### [How do I set deadlines for assignments? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You will be prompted to set a deadline when creating an assignment. You can also edit the deadline later by clicking on the top bar in the assignment page.
### [How do I provide detailed feedback? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz uses AI to generate initial feedback on student assignments. This feedback includes comments on key areas such as content accuracy, writing quality, and overall presentation. You can review and edit the feedback to ensure it meets your standards and addresses specific points you want to emphasize. To edit the feedback, open the student's submission, and you will see the AI-generated comments. Click on any comment to modify it or add additional notes. You can also add new comments to the submission for more personalized feedback.
### [Can I use my rubrics for grading? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can create custom rubrics in the "Rubrics" section and apply them to assignments for consistent and detailed grading. Additionally, you can use GradeWiz AI to generate detailed, specific rubrics for your assignment by clicking on the Magic Wand icon next to your question.
### [How accurate is the AI-generated feedback? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz has a 95% accuracy rate when benchmarked against teaching assistants for introductory to medium-level classes.
### [How do I share graded assignments with students? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click "Publish Grades" on the assignment page to share graded assignments with students.
### [Can students see the grading rubrics? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, students can view the grading rubrics used for their assignments.
### [How do I provide an answer key for an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
After creating the assignment, professors should download the PDF, fill it out, and submit it for extraction. This is optional but highly encouraged as it increases grading accuracy and allows for less detailed rubrics.
### [How do I delete my account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Go to your profile, select "Delete Account," and confirm. This will permanently delete all associated data, including classes, grades, and submission history.
### [What data does GradeWiz collect from users? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz only collects necessary cookies to keep you logged in. We do not use marketing, targeting, or personalization cookies and will never sell your data.
### [How is my data protected? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Your data is protected using SSL protocol encryption and does not leave the platform without being anonymized. To learn more, reach out to legal@gradewiz.ai
### [Can I export my data from GradeWiz? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can export your grades as a CSV file from the assignment page by clicking "Export Grades."
### [What should I do if I suspect a security breach? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Contact support@gradewiz.ai immediately and provide a detailed description of the issue.
### [How do I report a problem with my account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Reach out to support@gradewiz.ai for assistance with any account issues.
### [How can I contact GradeWiz support? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You can contact us at support@gradewiz.ai or schedule a meeting [here (preferred)](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/calendly.com/maxbohun/gradewiz>).
### [Are there any training sessions or webinars available for new users? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, please schedule a training session [here](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/calendly.com/maxbohun/gradewiz>).
### [How do I provide feedback about GradeWiz? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
We value your feedback. Please reach out to support@gradewiz.ai with your comments and suggestions.
![GradeWiz logo](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/gradewiz-logo.svg)
GradeWiz
[![linkedin](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/in.svg)](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/98695459/admin/dashboard/>) [![youtube](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/yb.svg)](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/www.youtube.com/@GradeWiz>)

## Frequently asked questions
Getting Started Using GradeWiz Feedback and Grading Account and Privacy General
### How do I create an account? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
To create an account, visit the login page and follow the prompts to enter your information. You will receive a confirmation email to activate your account.
### How do I log in? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Go to the login page and enter your email and password. If you forgot your password, use the "Forgot Password" link to reset it.
### What information do I need to create an account? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For a teacher account, you'll need your First Name, Last Name, School Name, email address, and an access code. If you're interested in a free trial and need an access code, email support@gradewiz.ai.
### How do I confirm my email address after signing up? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You will receive a verification email with a link to confirm your email address. 
### What should I do if I don't receive the confirmation email? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Check out How Do I Sign Up?⟨41⟩ documentation.
### How do I change my account password? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click "Forgot Password" on the login page and enter your email to reset your password.
### Can I create multiple accounts with the same email? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
No, each email address can only be associated with one account.
### How do I update my profile information? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Currently, you cannot modify your account information after signing up, so please be careful when entering your details.
### Is there a mobile app for GradeWiz? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
No, we do not have a mobile app at the moment. If you think there's a need, please reach out to support@gradewiz.ai with your suggestions.
### What file formats are supported for assignment submissions? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Standard GradeWiz assignments only support PDF files for assignment submissions. Flex Assignments allow for textual input, images, and multiple-choice questions.
### How do I create an assignment? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Navigate to the "Assignments" tab and click "Create New Assignment." Upload the assignment PDF you'd like to use as a starting point, and GradeWiz will automatically input all the fields for you.
### How do teacher submissions work? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For teacher submissions, used for in-class assignments or exams, the teacher collects, scans, and submits the assignment. Automatic handwriting recognition detects the student's name and ID on the top of the page to assign the work to them.
### How do student submissions work? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For student submissions (i.e., take-home assignments), students are responsible for scanning and submitting their assignments as PDFs on the assignment page.
### Can I edit an assignment after it has been created? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can edit the assignment until it is published. Once published, the assignment cannot be edited. If you made a mistake, you would need to delete it and create a new one. This prevents discrepancies between the distributed assignment PDFs and the updated versions. 
### How do I delete an assignment? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click the trash can icon on the assignment list to delete an assignment.
### How do I view all submissions for an assignment? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
After clicking on the assignment, scroll down to review submissions either by student or by question. Reviewing by student allows you to see each student's entire submission, while reviewing by question lets you compare responses to the same question across different students.
### Can students submit assignments late? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, late submissions are accepted until grades are published.
### How do I set deadlines for assignments? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You will be prompted to set a deadline when creating an assignment. You can also edit the deadline later by clicking on the top bar in the assignment page.
### How do I provide detailed feedback? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz uses AI to generate initial feedback on student assignments. This feedback includes comments on key areas such as content accuracy, writing quality, and overall presentation. You can review and edit the feedback to ensure it meets your standards and addresses specific points you want to emphasize. To edit the feedback, open the student's submission, and you will see the AI-generated comments. Click on any comment to modify it or add additional notes. You can also add new comments to the submission for more personalized feedback.
### Can I use my rubrics for grading? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can create custom rubrics in the "Rubrics" section and apply them to assignments for consistent and detailed grading. Additionally, you can use GradeWiz AI to generate detailed, specific rubrics for your assignment by clicking on the Magic Wand icon next to your question.
### How accurate is the AI-generated feedback? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz has a 95% accuracy rate when benchmarked against teaching assistants for introductory to medium-level classes.
### How do I share graded assignments with students? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click "Publish Grades" on the assignment page to share graded assignments with students.
### Can students see the grading rubrics? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, students can view the grading rubrics used for their assignments.
### How do I provide an answer key for an assignment? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
After creating the assignment, professors should download the PDF, fill it out, and submit it for extraction. This is optional but highly encouraged as it increases grading accuracy and allows for less detailed rubrics.
### How do I delete my account? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Go to your profile, select "Delete Account," and confirm. This will permanently delete all associated data, including classes, grades, and submission history.
### What data does GradeWiz collect from users? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz only collects necessary cookies to keep you logged in. We do not use marketing, targeting, or personalization cookies and will never sell your data.
### How is my data protected? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Your data is protected using SSL protocol encryption and does not leave the platform without being anonymized. To learn more, reach out to legal@gradewiz.ai
### Can I export my data from GradeWiz? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can export your grades as a CSV file from the assignment page by clicking "Export Grades."
### What should I do if I suspect a security breach? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Contact support@gradewiz.ai immediately and provide a detailed description of the issue.
### How do I report a problem with my account? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Reach out to support@gradewiz.ai for assistance with any account issues.
### How can I contact GradeWiz support? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You can contact us at support@gradewiz.ai or schedule a meeting here (preferred)⟨8⟩.
### Are there any training sessions or webinars available for new users? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, please schedule a training session here⟨8⟩.
### How do I provide feedback about GradeWiz? ![plus⟨40⟩ ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
We value your feedback. Please reach out to support@gradewiz.ai with your comments and suggestions.
![GradeWiz logo⟨1⟩]

generated_description:
### GradeWiz: Revolutionizing Grading with AI

**Overview**  
Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W25, GradeWiz is an AI-powered teaching assistant based in San Francisco that transforms the grading landscape for educators. With a compact team of just two, GradeWiz is making waves across campuses—already being utilized at 12 colleges, it slashes grading time by an impressive 60% on average.

**The Mission**  
GradeWiz exists to empower educators, allowing them to focus on what they truly love—teaching—while ensuring students receive timely, constructive feedback. The platform mimics the nuanced grading style of human teaching assistants, making it a seamless tool for professors.

**Core Features**  
- **AI-Powered Grading:** Using advanced computer vision, GradeWiz analyzes submitted work, breaking it down into individual questions and applying a unique grading rubric akin to each instructor's style.
- **Rapid Feedback:** With a robust Symphony Model boasting a 95% accuracy rate, students can receive personalized, detailed feedback almost instantly after they submit their assignments.
- **Data-Driven Insights:** Educators don’t just get grades; they also gain a holistic view of common student misconceptions, allowing for targeted improvements in teaching.

**What Users Are Saying**  
Feedback from educators has been overwhelmingly positive. Many report drastic reductions in grading time (up to 70% less), while students love the prompt, detailed feedback they receive. Professors describe it as akin to having a "blazing fast TA" on call 24/7.

**Why It Matters**  
GradeWiz is not just another educational tool; it's a strategic ally in modernizing education. It facilitates fairness and consistency in grading, ensuring that all students get the attention and insights they need without burdening educators with endless paperwork. By leveraging AI, GradeWiz stands to change the way grading is approached in academic institutions, one assignment at a time.

**Get Involved**  
Interested in bringing GradeWiz to your institution? Check out their website [here](https://www.gradewiz.ai/) for more information on features, benefits, and to connect with the founders. 

### Summary  
In a world where education is inundated with data and deadlines, GradeWiz offers a refreshing, efficient solution that benefits both teachers and students. It’s not just about making grading faster; it’s about enhancing the learning experience and ensuring no student is left behind.
